meanings.definition: Resembling blood in color or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky a bloodlike hue.
meanings.sent2: The spilled juice had a bloodlike appearance on the white tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The strawberry jam looked so bloodlike that it made me crave a PB&J sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The red paint flowed across the canvas in a bloodlike manner.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie had a scene with bloodlike liquid dripping from the ceiling, creating a chilling atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or qualities of blood.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks turned a bloodlike shade when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent2: The tomato soup had a thick and bloodlike texture.
meanings.sent3: The ketchup looked so bloodlike that it made the hot dog seem like a monster's meal.
meanings.sent4: The red velvet cake was so moist and bloodlike that it seemed almost sinful to eat.
meanings.sent5: The crime scene was covered in bloodlike stains, creating a sense of unease among the investigators.
